componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please add Contract Line Items to this Contract. Contracts should always have at least one Line Item.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Contract has no Line Items

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please either extend the Contract End Date to a future date or Terminate the Contract. Contracts should not be left as Expired.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Actual Annual Revenue and Actual Annual Gross Margin do not include values for Pending Line Items. When the Pending Line Items reach their Start Date the Actual Values will be updated.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Pending Lines will automatically activate on their Start Date. They are not included in Financial Calculations until Activation.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Pending Line Items are not included in Actual Financial Values until their Start Date

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Contract has Pending Line Items

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Currency does not match Owner Currency and/or Account Currency

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Account Key Contact is inactive

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please add the key Contact for the Contract
